sql: SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', login, vorname as 'first_name', nachname as 'last_name' FROM 'heidicon.public.user'
SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', name, name as 'displayname:de-DE' FROM 'heidicon.public.usergruppe'
SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', name as 'name:de-DE' FROM 'heidicon.public.pool'

SELECT l.from_id || ':' || to_id as '__source_unique_id', l.to_id as group_id, l.from_id as user_id FROM 'heidicon.public.eadb_links' l JOIN 'heidicon.public.user' u ON l.from_id = u.id JOIN 'heidicon.public.usergruppe' g ON l.to_id = g.id WHERE l.from_table_id = 14 AND l.to_table_id=12
